titleStmt.title: The lettin[g] of humours blood in the head-vaine with a new morissco, daunced by seauen satyres, vpon the bottome of Diog[e?]nes tubbe.
titleStmt.author: Rowlands, Samuel, 1570?-1630?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. White for W.F.,

notesStmt.note: Re-issued in 1607 with title: Humours ordinarie.
Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of originals in the British Library and the Bodleian Library.
